candidates.body:
Bumps [toml](https://github.com/toml-rs/toml) from 0.7.8 to 0.8.12.
Commits

  • 7979905 docs: Update changelog

  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

candidates.title: Upgrade dependencies, Remove MSRV, start developing 0.3.0
Create Utility to get Bytes of a Layer.
candidates.body:
Replaces #93 - I was reaching for the wrong abstraction.

## Why

I want to be able to work with arbitrary layers. The custom layer types of devcontainers specifically.

## Provide

It seems like providing the bytes of a given layer is the least opinionated way to handle this.

## Additional

This uses `oci_spec::image::MediaType` as the callback argument for filtering. Worth considering exposing that value for easier usage.

candidates.title: Do not generate documents for ocipkg command
`ocipkg-inspect` command
candidates.body:
```
ocipkg inspect test.tar
```

will show contents in the oci-arhive like

```
$ ocipkg inspect build/ocipkg_static_cpp.tar 
[ghcr.io/termoshtt/ocipkg/static/cpp:3ee8e7b]
  └─ libocipkg_static_cpp.a
```

(example in #80)

candidates.title: Drop shared library support
candidates.body: Shared library does not match ocipkg concept. Preparing shared libraries out of system package management is not a good idea in general.

candidates.title: Pin `git2` dependency to 0.14.2
candidates.body:
In order to maintain a MSRV of 1.57 the git2 dependency was downgraded from 0.14.4 to 0.13.25 in [1].
This is problematic since versions prior to 0.14 are known to crash on systems with `libgit2` >=
1.4.0. Luckily git2 only raised its requirements in version 0.14.3. Thus, pin to 0.14.2 instead
of going all the way back to 0.13.x.

[1] https://github.com/termoshtt/ocipkg/pull/66

candidates.title: Set MSRV to 1.57.0
candidates.body: - Downgrade git2 0.14.x which build with Rust 1.57.0

candidates.title: Split ocipkg-cli crate
candidates.body: Drop `cli` feature and split it as separate crate because it has many optional dependencies.

candidates.title: Drop vergen and clap-vergen
candidates.body:
Revert #62 

`vergen` try to get git info in `build.rs`, but it does not compatible with `cargo install`. We cannot get collect version info in this case.

candidates.title: Make vergen dependency optional
candidates.body: Hot fix of 0.1.1, which has been yanked
